post_install:
# NOTE: with $env:HOME updates to install_app(), this is *no longer needed*
        if ( ! $(env -t 'user' HOME) ) { env -t 'user' HOME $env:USERPROFILE } # future use; NOTE: $env:HOME is *not* removed with `scoop uninstall openssh...`
        if ( ! $(env HOME) ) { env HOME $env:USERPROFILE } # current process
        if ( $env:HOME -ne $env:USERPROFILE ) { warn 'WARN: $env:HOME is not set equal to $env:USERPROFILE' }
